meeting_info.location: City Hall, Conference Room 6ES / Video Conference

agenda_items.title: Call to Order
agenda_items.description: Opening of the meeting by the chair.

agenda_items.title: Roll Call
agenda_items.description: Attendance check by the Community Development Coordinator.

agenda_items.title: Approval of Monthly Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the February 1, 2024 meeting.

agenda_items.title: Community Development Division Report
agenda_items.description: Report including updates regarding proposed committee meetings, agenda items, and updates for the Consolidated Plan.

agenda_items.title: Chair’s Report
agenda_items.description: General greetings and acknowledgements, introduction of new commission members, and scheduling of committee meetings.

agenda_items.title: Vice Chair’s Report
agenda_items.description: General acknowledgements and consideration of 2024 CDC Community Development Week Community Tour Sites.

agenda_items.title: Announcement
agenda_items.description: Expressions of thanks, congratulations, or condolence; information about holiday schedules and upcoming events.
